title: sanuk broken?
content:
Anybody else having the same problems with the free sanuk fat download from fontshop a couple of months ago?  
Can it be fixed?

| --- | --- |

author: Jan

comments.content: In which program are you using it? I am not having that problem here in text edit.

Yeah. Strange. In simple text editors it works ok.  
But not in old QXP4 or old FH9.
